duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage Oracle 19c environments including PL/SQL, OEM, RMAN, and Data Guard
Administer and support Apex/ORDS 19 or higher and Linux system administration for Oracle databases and application servers
Scripting, job scheduling, and database upgrade and patching using OEM Provisioning Tool
Expertise with database performance tuning, character set migration, and managing databases with multi-tenant architecture
Proficiency in managing large databases in Cloud environments, specifically RDS, EC2, ELB, S3 in AWS
Configuration and management of Oracle Fusion Middleware, WebLogic, and Apache, as well as setting up WebLogic on Linux, configuring mod pl/SQL, ORDS, and Apex Administration 5.0 or higher
